properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM,S.* FROM( SELECT BOARDNO, CATEGORY, TITLE, USERID, CREATEDATE, BOARDLIKE, COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORYNO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y') S ) WHERE "ROWNUM" BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT=COUNT+1 WHERE BOARDNO=? AND STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BOARDNO=? AND STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARDNO=? AND STATUS='Y'
